function About() { return (

About Me

A brief introduction about who I am and what I do.

I am an aspiring MERN Stack Developer with a background in Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA). I enjoy turning ideas into functional and user-friendly web applications using technologies like HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and React. On the backend, I work with Node.js, Express, and databases such as SQLite and MySQL.

I have completed intensive web development training at NxtWave and worked as a Teaching Assistant, helping learners with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. I enjoy writing clean code, learning new concepts, and building projects that solve real-world problems.

); } export default About;
